Master Project 1 & 2 Seminar Timetable
======================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Nov 16, 2017 | [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/seminar-mp.png)

Please find  Master by Taught Course (Research Project Thesis) Seminar as in the following link [https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/seminar-timetable-20172018-1/](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/seminar-timetable-20172018-1/)
 for your action and perusal.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

1\. The assessment forms mentioned as below for the said programs can be accessed from the following link [https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate/forms/](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate/forms/)

**Master Project 1 (MKE\*1814)**  
• RP1-2 form: Proposal Defense Form ([Word](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/07/RP1-2-new.docx)
 / [PDF](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/07/RP1-2-new.pdf)
)  
**Master Project 2 (MKE\*1826)**  
• RP2-2 form: Proposal Defense Form ([Word](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/07/RP2-2-new.docx)
 / [PDF](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/07/RP2-2-new.pdf)
)

2\. Students need to print, fill-in their particulars, and provide the assessment form during the presentation session to the panels.

3\. Kindly bring your own notebook for the presentation.

Your cooperation is very much appreciated.

Thank you.
